name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-live-caption-csharp
title: Meeting side panel application uses CART link to send caption in live meeting.
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to utilize CART links to send live captions in Microsoft Teams meetings.
longDescription: This sample application illustrates how to enable live captions in Microsoft Teams meetings using CART links. It features a meeting side panel for managing captions, integrating with meeting chat and details for enhanced interactivity.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing meeting side panel application uses cart link to send caption in live meeting.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
